1528710.name: Cyber-Cat
1528710.description: What was once your cute animal friends is now an army of possessed monsters serving an evil, dimension traveling snake. They are determined to annihilate any foe in their path, and it is up to you, Cyber-Cat, the result of a covert cybernetic weapons program, to stop them. Travel between worlds, taking on an array of enemies from minigun wielding bears to majestic unicorns and ferocious minotaurs, find powerful weapons, augment your abilities, upgrade your arsenal, and save the world... or destroy it.
1528710.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
